text: "Easy Lover" is a 1984 song by Philip Bailey and Phil Collins. It was taken from Bailey's album Chinese Wall. It went to number 1 in Canada, Ireland, the Netherlands and the United Kingdom, number 2 in New Zealand and the United States, number 5 in Finland and Germany, number 6 in South Africa, number 8 in Switzerland, number 10 in Sweden, number 11 in Spain, number 14 in France and number 21 in Austria and Italy. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1986. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Phil Collins songs Category:Dance- rock songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Easy Lover
